meanings.definition: A person who participates in an exhibition or display.
meanings.sent1: The exhibitioners proudly showcased their artwork at the gallery.
meanings.sent2: Many talented exhibitioners displayed their projects at the science fair.
meanings.sent3: The exhibitioners giggled as they set up their booth at the school event.
meanings.sent4: The colorful paintings by the exhibitioners transformed the room into a vibrant gallery.
meanings.sent5: Visitors were impressed by the creativity and skill of the exhibitioners' presentations.

meanings.definition: A student who has been awarded an exhibition (scholarship) at a university.
meanings.sent1: The university's top exhibitioners received scholarships for their academic achievements.
meanings.sent2: She was thrilled to be chosen as one of the exhibitioners for the prestigious scholarship.
meanings.sent3: The exhibitioners celebrated their scholarships with a joyful dinner together.
meanings.sent4: Being selected as an exhibitioner opened up new opportunities for her education.
meanings.sent5: The hard work and dedication of the exhibitioners paid off with their well-deserved scholarships.
